snippet: Anthony D. Weiner answers questions posed by Buzzfeed’s editor in chief about his therapy, his former roommate Jon Stewart and the hurt he caused his wife, Huma Abedin.
abstract: Trailside blog; highlights of New York Democratic mayoral candidate Anthony D Weiner’s Buzzfeed interview include comments about his therapy, former roommate Jon Stewart and hurt he has caused wife Huma Abedin.
lead_paragraph: Anthony D. Weiner answers questions posed by Buzzfeed’s editor in chief about his therapy, his former roommate Jon Stewart and the hurt he caused his wife, Huma Abedin.

headline.main: Weiner on a Roommate, Therapy and the Clintons
headline.print_headline:
Weiner on a Roommate, 
Therapy and the Clintons
